The following gladiator poll is now closed.  Here are the 
final results: 


POLL QUESTION: Should the people who work on tournament 
scenarios be allowed to participate in 
the tournament? 

CHOICES AND RESULTS
- yes, 6 votes, 75.00%  
- no, 2 votes, 25.00%
